import React , {useState} from 'react'; import './discount.css'; import myImg from '../../../images/download.jpg' const Discount = () => { const [second,setSecond] = useState(6); const [minute,setMinute] = useState(1); const [hour,setHour] = useState(14); const [day,setDay] = useState(2); return ( <>

); function deadline() { setTimeout(() => { setSecond(second - 1); if(second == 0){ setMinute(minute - 1) setSecond(59) } if(minute == 0 & second == 0){ setHour(hour - 1) setMinute(59) } if(hour == 0 & minute == 0 & second == 0){ setDay(day - 1) setHour(23) } },1000) } } export default Discount;
